Fit discrete models

fit_discrete.Rd

Except Markov Chain model

fit_discrete(
  train,
  test = NULL,
  max_score,
  model = c("BinRW", "BinMC", "OrderedRW", "RW"),
  prior = default_prior(model, max_score),
  ...
)

Arguments

train

Training dataframe (details of the format in prepare_data_lgtd())
test

Testing dataframe (details of the format in prepare_data_lgtd())
max_score

Maximum value that the score can take
model

Model name
prior

A named list of corresponding to parameters' prior.
...

Arguments to be pass to rstan::sampling()

Value

Stanfit object

See also

fit_BinRW(), fit_BinMC(), fit_OrderedRW(), fit_RW()
